remarks: The orthocomplement of a subspace atom is a hyperplane.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2014.)
statement:
dochsatshpb.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochsatshpb.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsatshpb.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsatshpb.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
dochsatshpb.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
dochsatshpb.y $e |- Y = ( LSHyp ` U ) $.
dochsatshpb.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochsatshpb.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. S ) $.
dochsatshpb $p |- ( ph -> ( Q e. A <-> ( ._|_ ` Q ) e. Y ) ) $.
